class.name: Object
class.brief_description: Base class for all non built-in types.
class.description: Base class for all non built-in types. Everything not a built-in type starts the inheritance chain from this class. Objects do not manage memory, if inheriting from one the object will most likely have to be deleted manually (call the [method free] function from the script or delete from C++). Some derivatives add memory management, such as [Reference] (which keeps a reference count and deletes itself automatically when no longer referenced) and [Node], which deletes the children tree when deleted. Objects export properties, which are mainly useful for storage and editing, but not really so much in programming. Properties are exported in [method _get_property_list] and handled in [method _get] and [method _set]. However, scripting languages and C++ have simpler means to export them. Objects also receive notifications ([method _notification]). Notifications are a simple way to notify the object about simple events, so they can all be handled together.

method.name: _get
method.description: Returns the given property. Returns [code]null[/code] if the [code]property[/code] does not exist.

method.name: _get_property_list
method.description: Returns the object's property list as an [Array] of dictionaries. Dictionaries must contain: name:String, type:int (see TYPE_* enum in [@GlobalScope]) and optionally: hint:int (see PROPERTY_HINT_* in [@GlobalScope]), hint_string:String, usage:int (see PROPERTY_USAGE_* in [@GlobalScope]).

method.name: _init
method.description: The virtual method called upon initialization.

method.name: _notification
method.description: Notify the object internally using an ID.

method.name: _set
method.description: Sets a property. Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]property[/code] exists.

method.name: add_user_signal
method.description: Adds a user-defined [code]signal[/code]. Arguments are optional, but can be added as an [Array] of dictionaries, each containing "name" and "type" (from [@GlobalScope] TYPE_*).

method.name: call
method.description: Calls the [code]method[/code] on the object and returns a result. Pass parameters as a comma separated list.

method.name: call_deferred
method.description: Calls the [code]method[/code] on the object during idle time and returns a result. Pass parameters as a comma separated list.

method.name: callv
method.description: Calls the [code]method[/code] on the object and returns a result. Pass parameters as an [Array].

method.name: can_translate_messages
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the object can translate strings.

method.name: connect
method.description: Connects a [code]signal[/code] to a [code]method[/code] on a [code]target[/code] object. Pass optional [code]binds[/code] to the call. Use [code]flags[/code] to set deferred or one shot connections. See [code]CONNECT_*[/code] constants. A [code]signal[/code] can only be connected once to a [code]method[/code]. It will throw an error if already connected. To avoid this, first use [method is_connected] to check for existing connections.

method.name: disconnect
method.description: Disconnects a [code]signal[/code] from a [code]method[/code] on the given [code]target[/code].

method.name: emit_signal
method.description: Emits the given [code]signal[/code].

method.name: free
method.description: Deletes the object from memory.

method.name: get
method.description: Returns a [Variant] for a [code]property[/code].

method.name: get_class
method.description: Returns the object's class as a [String].

method.name: get_incoming_connections
method.description: Returns an [Array] of dictionaries with information about signals that are connected to the object. Inside each [Dictionary] there are 3 fields: - "source" is a reference to signal emitter. - "signal_name" is name of connected signal. - "method_name" is a name of method to which signal is connected.

method.name: get_instance_id
method.description: Returns the object's unique instance ID.

method.name: get_meta
method.description: Returns the object's metadata for the given [code]name[/code].

method.name: get_meta_list
method.description: Returns the object's metadata as a [PoolStringArray].

method.name: get_method_list
method.description: Returns the object's methods and their signatures as an [Array].

method.name: get_property_list
method.description: Returns the list of properties as an [Array] of dictionaries. Dictionaries contain: name:String, type:int (see TYPE_* enum in [@GlobalScope]) and optionally: hint:int (see PROPERTY_HINT_* in [@GlobalScope]), hint_string:String, usage:int (see PROPERTY_USAGE_* in [@GlobalScope]).

method.name: get_script
method.description: Returns the object's [Script] or [code]null[/code] if one doesn't exist.

method.name: get_signal_connection_list
method.description: Returns an [Array] of connections for the given [code]signal[/code].

method.name: get_signal_list
method.description: Returns the list of signals as an [Array] of dictionaries.

method.name: has_meta
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a metadata is found with the given [code]name[/code].

method.name: has_method
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the object contains the given [code]method[/code].

method.name: has_user_signal
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given user-defined [code]signal[/code] exists.

method.name: is_blocking_signals
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if signal emission blocking is enabled.

method.name: is_class
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the object inherits from the given [code]type[/code].

method.name: is_connected
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a connection exists for a given [code]signal[/code], [code]target[/code], and [code]method[/code].

method.name: is_queued_for_deletion
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]queue_free[/code] method was called for the object.

method.name: notification
method.description: Notify the object of something.

method.name: set
method.description: Set property into the object.

method.name: set_block_signals
method.description: If set to true, signal emission is blocked.

method.name: set_message_translation
method.description: Define whether the object can translate strings (with calls to [method tr]). Default is true.

method.name: set_meta
method.description: Set a metadata into the object. Metadata is serialized. Metadata can be [i]anything[/i].

method.name: set_script
method.description: Set a script into the object, scripts extend the object functionality.

method.name: tr
method.description: Translate a message. Only works if message translation is enabled (which it is by default). See [method set_message_translation].

constants.constant: Called right when the object is initialized. Not available in script.
Called before the object is about to be deleted.
Connect a signal in deferred mode. This way, signal emissions are stored in a queue, then set on idle time.
Persisting connections are saved when the object is serialized to file.
One shot connections disconnect themselves after emission.
